exceptions.tactic: destruct (red_cons A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a p L2) as [Hred | Hred] eqn:Hcons.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM L1', L2 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In p (LetP (poly A0 eqA ltM) (list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a (L1' ++ L2)) (fun (u : poly A0 eqA ltM) (_ : u = nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a (L1' ++ L2)) => if zerop_dec A A0 eqA n ltM u then redacc L1' L2 else u :: redacc L1' (u :: L2))) IH : In p (redacc L1' L2) -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (L1' ++ L2) The term "a" has type "poly A0 eqA ltM" while it is expected to have type "OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)".

original: intros L1 L2 p H. induction L1 as [|a L1' IH]. - simpl in H. destruct H. - simpl in H. destruct (red_cons A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a p L2) as [Hred | Hred] eqn:Hcons. + destruct H. * subst a. eapply Cb_incl with (p:=p). apply Cb_sp. apply cs. * apply IH. apply H. + apply IH. apply H.
